verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ok'oc val a k'ool d'ayin, a d'ayach tzin say in colnab'il. In gana tzin col in b'a d'ayach icha tz'aj scolan sb'a nok' yunetac caxlanh d'a yalanh sk'axil snun, masanto ol lajvoquek' jun yaelal tic.
Ach in Diosal te nivan elk'ochi, tzin avaj d'ayach, yujto a achnhej tzach colvajnhej ved'oc.
A yuj a vach'k'olal, yuj pax to tz'elk'och tas tzala', yuj chi' masanto d'a satchaanh tzak'cot in colnab'il. Ol in a colel d'a yol sk'ab' eb' tzin ixtan chi'.
Ichato d'a scal nok' choj schi'an anima ayin eq'ui. A q'uen ye eb' lajan icha q'uen lanza yed' te' jul-lab'. A tas syal eb', lajan icha q'uen espada te jay ye.
Ach in Diosal, tz'ek'b'at snivanil elk'och d'a satchaanh. A snivanil elk'och chi', chequel d'a masanil yolyib'anhq'uinal tic.
A eb' ajk'ol yajoch d'ayin, ix yaq'uem in yaalil eb', manhxo animaoc vaj yuj eb', ix sb'oan jun olan eb' d'a yol in b'e, palta anheja' eb' ix b'at d'a yool.
Ach in Diosal, b'ecan in k'ool, in gana tzach in b'itej yed' vach' lolonel.
Yuj chi' ol vaq'uel in vayanh, ol ach in b'itej yed' te' arpa yed' salterio. Ayic van sacb'i, ol el in vayanh, ol ach in b'itani.
Mamin, ol val vach' lolonel d'ayach d'a scal juntzanh chonhab'. Ol ach in b'itej d'a scal juntzanh naci√≥n.
Nivan ton a vach'k'olal, masanto d'a satchaanh sk'ochi. Tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala'.
Ach in Diosal, tz'ek'b'at snivanil elk'och d'a satchaanh. A snivanil elk'och chi', chequel d'a masanil yolyib'anhq'uinal tic.
